channel.title: Following bug
channel.description:
omg...
everytime i press follow on a player i just walk up next to him...
when he starts move ill still be at the same place he started to move from =/
Anyone know why
Soz for bad englishz

item.title: Following bug
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

[code]It is on my server. Simply make the player move in the direction of the other player, and keep in mind they should stand behind the player, so you need to save the last direction a player has walked. And do not try and screw with copying the walking queue or anything like that…

Hint: getNextWalkingDirection();[/code]

Where exacly should i put in getNextWalkingDirection();[/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 07:02:54 PM[/size][hr][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 07:03:51 PM[/size][hr]Bump

Read full topic

item.title: Following bug
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

It is on my server. Simply make the player move in the direction of the other player, and keep in mind they should stand behind the player, so you need to save the last direction a player has walked. And do not try and screw with copying the walking queue or anything like that…

Hint: getNextWalkingDirection();

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @99_Clovers 99_Clovers
item.description:
@99_Clovers wrote:

Its not implimented into your server obviously…you asked why…but I cant help fix its not on most servers unless you find out how too fix it yourself.
